project.title: Benefits of Structured Prompting for LLMs
project.core_argument: Structured prompting improves LLM output quality by providing explicit constraints and format guidance, reducing hallucinations and improving task completion rates.
project.key_insight: Constraints guide generation toward more accurate and useful outputs
